title: Trump news live: Latest updates as president faces Republican backlash over Syria policy
text:
Donald Trump’s announcement that the US will withdraw troops from northern Syria - leaving its allies against Isis in the Syrian Democratic Forces exposed to Turkish aggression - has been branded “bats*** crazy” by ex-US national security adviser Susan Rice and reportedly left his own senior military officials completely blindsided.

“Everyone was absolutely flabbergasted by this. I tell you that as a fact,” admiral James Stavridis told MSNBC. “Nobody saw it coming, and that is a real problem when you’re trying to conduct not only foreign policy... but also military operations.”

The president defended his decision on Monday in the face of storm of condemnation from his fellow Republicans, which temporarily attracted attention away from the House impeachment inquiry resuming today, as it emerges his team is seeking to freeze out critics of the administration from attending the 2020 Republican National Convention.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.
